ygData.subject: Re: The Flames Of Hell and Fury of Lucifer
ygData.msgSnippet: (Carnage, Double Punch is cloaked.  You could see where the missiles fired from and shoot at that area, but he is invisible to the optic sensor, and by charges

(Carnage, Double Punch is cloaked.  You could see where the missiles fired 
from and shoot at that area, but he is invisible to the optic sensor, and by 
charges do you mean explosives, or laser blasts?)


Pyro/Hiss/Breakdown/Scavenger/Punch/Double 
Punch/Manterror/Shockwave/Scattershot:




Pyro yelled, charges sending him slamming several feet backwards.  Getting up 
slowly, he felt a slight trickle of mech-fluid leaking down his torso.  

"You son of a--ooooh, the forest...thinking of heading for the forest?  
Hmmm...That gives me a reason to burn it...so they don't escape.  Yeeessssss, 
so they can't escape, that's a good reason."

Transforming to his tank mode, the obsessed Predacon targeted with his 
cannon, firing three fire balls into the forest, speeding towards it to use 
his flame thrower and really start some fun.

---

Double Punch cursed, being slammed to his back from the charges.  He slowly 
got up, realizing there was a slight fringe effect where he was, his cloaking 
ability damaged.

-Slag- he said in his mind, raising a pincher.  "You'll pay for that!" he 
fired an energy-singature seeking missile off at Dinobot's back.

---

Manterror heard missile fire, turning, spotted a Maximal opening fire on the 
Predacons.

"Hmmm...I think...I'll take out the one who isn't firing...seems safer." he 
raised both clawed appendages, firing two ion disks off at Tavatron's legs 
from behind.

---

Scavenger screamed, transforming, leaping into the air, part of the 
paralyzing beam hitting his foot, the Predacon crashing to the ground.  
Pushing himself up, he jumped up on the back of Pyro's tank mode.

"Hey, Pyro, hehe.  How about a ride?"

"Got an energon?"

"No..."

"I don't pick up hitch hikers!" Pyro swerved quickly and unexpectedly to the 
left, sending Scavenger screaming off the tank, crashing to the ground, Pyro 
continuing his short journey for the forest, firing off another fireball at 
the forest.

---

Breakdown chuckled, running.  Calculating and firing, he fired a grenade off 
that would explode on impact a few meters in front of Dinobot and Tavatron, 
hoping to keep them out of the forest they were obviously running to.  
Activating his com, the Pred replied to Zardus' transmission.

"WE ARE IN THE MIDDLE OF A CHASE AND ABOUT TO KILL MAXIMALS!  WE HAVE NO TIME 
FOR YOUR FEMININE WANTS!" he screamed, continuing to chase.



---

Hiss cursed, blasts digging into his chest plate, knocking him back several 
feet, steadying himself, he continued to pursue the two raptors on the ground.


===

Shockwave's long range scanners picked up a few Maximal energy signatures, 
and over a dozen Predacon signatures, and he was picking up heavy weapons 
fire.

"The Maximals are pathetic, with one of their bases nearly obliterated.  
Letting them lose four members will not help, and will shift the balance to 
greatly.  That is not acceptable as of yet."


===

Scattershot clapped one hand against his chest a few times.  "Goodie, 
Zardus," he said into his comm. unit, "Can we paint the base pink?  Oooh, or 
maybe purple?" he asked in his comm., cackling madly, firing off a few rounds 
at Prowl.
